2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502\u2502*/\r\n#define ll long long\r\n#define pb push_back\r\n#define MP make_pair\r\n#define F first\r\n#define S second\r\n#define forn(i, n) for(int i =0; i < int(n); i++)\r\nusing namespace std;\r\nvector <ll> h,v;\r\n\r\nint main()\r\n{\r\n    //freopen (\"input.txt\",\"r\", stdin);\r\n    //freopen (\"output.txt\",\"w\", stdout);\r\n    int t=1;\r\n    //cin >> t;\r\n    while(t--)\r\n    {\r\n        int n,k,ans=0;\r\n        cin >> n ;\r\n        forn( i ,n)\r\n        {\r\n            int x;\r\n            cin>>x;\r\n            h.pb(x);\r\n        }\r\n        ll temp =0;\r\n        v.pb(0);\r\n        for(int i=n-1;i >= 0;i--)\r\n        {\r\n            temp=max(temp,h[i]);\r\n            v.pb(temp);\r\n        }\r\n        reverse(v.begin(),v.end());\r\n\r\n        forn(i,n)\r\n        {\r\n            if(h[i]<v[i])\r\n                cout << (v[i]-h[i])+1 <<\" \";\r\n            else if( h[i]>v[i])\r\n                cout << 1 <<\" \";\r\n            else\r\n                cout << 0 <<\" \";\r\n        }\r\n        cout <<endl;\r\n\r\n    }\r\n\r\n}\r\n\r\n\r\n"
}
